description:
As an ice cream and coffee business, we go through tons of milk from our brand of choice, @cpmeijisingapore.

Striving to reduce our waste, we worked with conservation organisation @semula_asia to upcycle the plastic from milk bottles and caps to create elegant marble-designed stool tops. 

And with respect for quality and love of craft, we chose to work with Roger&Sons, a local, family-run woodworking studio to produce the stools. 

Hereâ€™s 30 seconds with Morgan from @rogerandsons on the collaboration.

Call for Meiji Chocolate Milk caps still open! Bring your washed caps to any of our Creamier outlets, and receive a $1 discount for every 5 caps.

#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

description:
The richness in life lies in our memories of the moments. A place to create happy memories, and so this has become our ethos in designing Creamier spaces, where anyone is welcomed and happy moments are created over scoops of delicious ice cream or a cup of coffee. 

Moments of Happiness Art Exhibition
Creamier x Organisation of Illustrators Council Singapore

For first-time visitors to our Toa Payoh and Punggol Northshore spaces, these @oicsingapore prints are available for purchase! Just drop us a form enquiry via the #linkinbio

#YongSiakStreetKidsTrail kicks off today and we have two specials at Creamier Tiong Bahru only.

Enjoy the taste of tradition and innovation with @microbakerykitchen and Creamierâ€™s Rainbow Ice Cream Bread! Naturally coloured with matcha and sweet potato powder, the rainbow bread is paired with our heritage flavours for the month - Waffled Putu Piring, Sesame Tang Yuan and Pulut Hitam.

If youâ€™d like to recreate this after this weekend, take home our bread and ice cream bundle! Starting from $21.90, choose your favourite Creamier ice cream pint to go along with this freshly crafted @microbakerykitchen rainbow bread loaf.

Weâ€™re looking forward to seeing all the #YongSiakKids and #kidsatheart today!

P.S. If youâ€™re taking part in the Magical Trail, we have a Tikam game that is free for all participants to take part! Just swing by Creamierâ€™s little booth, answer some questions about Singaporeâ€™s history and keep trying till you secure a well-deserved treat!

Creamier Tiong Bahru will be open from 10am to 10pm today, 20 August 2023.

description:
Meet our Rainbow Ice Cream Bread, a co-creation between @microbakerykitchen and Creamier, as our special for the Yong Siak Street Children's Trail happening this Sunday (20th August) along Yong Siak Street.

The bread is freshly crafted by Micro Bakery, and is naturally coloured with Matcha and Sweet Potato Powder for that iconic local rainbow bread look. In line with National Day this August, we paired it with our three heritage flavours - Waffled Putu Piring, Sesame Tang Yuan and Pulut Hitam.

Only available on 20th August at Creamier Tiong Bahru and Micro Bakery, a special for the Yong Siak Street Children's Trail. Don't miss this limited-time delight!

#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #cafe #momentsofhappiness #artisanal #dessert #singapore #local #YongSiakKids #yongsiakstreetkidstrail

description:
In just a weekâ€™s time on Sunday August 20, the Yong Siak Street neighbourhood â€” home to Creamier Tiong Bahru cafe â€” will be coming alive with our annual Childrenâ€™s Street Trail! In collaboration with our neighbours @woodsinthebooks, @nanaandbird, @plainvanillasg , @microbakerykitchen, and @oliveankara, you can enjoy a series of activities for the young such as tikam tikam, a scavenger hunt, cookie decoration, and build-your-own-parfait. Collect stickers as you move along the street to complete activities and redeem a goodie bag when youâ€™ve got ten!

African mahogany, which is commonly known for its deep reddish-brown hues, today exhibits sunkissed, greyish tonesâ€”textures and fissures that indicate the passage of time. Instead of throwing them away, @creamier_sg has embraced the impacts of sunburn and weathering on these benches. Originally designed for the Sultan Gate parklet with URA in 2020, they have since been adopted and housed by Creamier. Leash hooks were later added to the benches at their pet-friendly East Coast outlet.

Thank you for not letting these benches go to waste! + some bonus pics of a wall-bench and ice-cream stools!

#rogerandsons #thelocaltreeproject #creamier #momentsofhappiness
